TextView.android:text: Request for Certification (Certificate of Live Birth, Certificate of Marriage & Certificate of Death)
Issue certification of birth, death & marriage for Local employment, abroad, SSS, PhilHealth & benefit claims.

- Document owner
- Parents
- Relatives (Ascendant/Descendant)
- Guardians
- Court
1. Post Office, COMELEC, LTO, GSIS, PAGIBIG, DFA, National ID
1. Document Owner or any of the Requesting party submit requirements
1.1. Received\n\n1.2. Verify the veracity of the requirements or documents
1.3. Verify at the computer If document is already encoded:
2. Pay to MTO the certification fee
1. Pay to MTO the verification fee
1.1. Process payment and issue OR & verify into the Books/Register of the Requested document If document is available in the Register:
2. Pay to MTO the certification fee
3.1. Retrieve Office file\n\n3.2. Encode in the computer, review

4.1. Present to the MCR/ Assistant for review & signature

4.2. Affix seal

4.3. Segregate

4.4. give certification the owner’s file, & file
5. Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) and drop it in the feedback box
5.1. Request Client to Accomplish Client Satisfactory Survey (CSS) form in the feedback box
